content:
Bhogaon

Bhogaon is a town and a nagar panchayat in Mainpuri district  in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India.

Demographics
As of 2001[update] India census,{"citetype": "web", "url": "http://www.censusindia.net/results/town.php?stad=A&state5=999", "title": "Census of India 2001: Data from the 2001 Census, including cities, villages and towns  (Provisional)", "accessdate": "2008-11-01", "archiveurl": "https://web.archive.org/web/20040616075334/http://www.censusindia.net/results/town.php?stad=A&state5=999", "archivedate": "2004-06-16"} Bhogaon had a population of 26,799. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bhogaon has an average literacy rate of 55%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 61% and female literacy of 47%. 17% of the population is under 6 years of age.
